data.title: Braceface säsong 2
data.meta_description: Se var Braceface går på tv. Braceface är animerad serier. Handling: Sally er 13 år, går i 8. klasse og kæmper med alt, hvad teenagelivet byder på.
data.text:
Sharon is embarassed when her visiting Grampy makes prejudiced remarks to Maria and her new boyfriend Cloud, who's Arab. Sharon wonders how she can defend Grampy, unless deep down, she is prejudiced also.

Alyson's firefighter dad rescues Connor from a fire at LifeCycles, bringing the two closer. This irritates Nina, who wants Alyson to focus on her role as 'dresser' at Nina's dance recital.

Helen decides to spend more time with her daughter to 'guide her' through the maze of adolescent hormonal dangers. Sharon sneaks out to a house party in answer to all of this mothering.

Sharons feels the need to fit in after being picked on for modeling a dress.

Sharon's thrilled when Dion asks her to model in the school fashion show but when Nina makes a few catty remarks Sharon starts feeling insecure about her body and goes on a diet.

Sharon wonders if Alden still has feelings for her and when their English teacher casts them as the romantic leads (who kiss!) Sharon gets her opportunity to find out.

When the housekeeper hired to stay the week with the kids quits unexpectedly, Sharon elects herself as the 'surrogate mom' to demonstrate to her mother that she is responsible.

Sharon and Adam argue about their future occupations causing Sharon to play a joke on her brother that results in him apprenticing at a funeral home.

Helen's best friend from high school returns to Elkford with her daughter, Genesis. The young lady is Sharon's age, but Sharon isn't at all happy with having to spend all her time 'babysitting' a stranger.

While taking part in a project on 'parenting', Sharon thinks that she'll be a great mom who will also be able to do anything and everything she wants; until things get complicated trying to balance all of her responsibilities.

Sharon thinks Nina got a nose job during March break and her innocent gossip gets out of control, ruining a public relations opportunity for Nina.

When Sharon tries to end her relationship with Marcello, the message is delivered to Connor by mistake who thinks Alyson is trying to break up with him.
